page.title: 01Summary of the area.
page.content: This is an area predominantly agricultural in character and depending significantly on farming for its economic and social stability. There is a well_established quarrying industry contributing to the male employment in the immediate locality as well as a healthy timber trade associated with the Greenwich Hospital Estate at Middleton.The village itself provides banking,medical,shopping, garage and hotel facilities for a scattered population and is spiritually served by an Anglican and 2 Presbyterian churches.Schooling to age 13 is provided by First and Middle schools.Recently the village was by_passed with some economic impact on shops and hotels.
